originalText.text: I've been working with Joshua over five years. He is a great listener and able to see beyond the current situation into your deeper health. What I also appreciate is his dynamic approach, he evolves over time. He is able to get to the heart of issues and help you develop self awareness. My last session opened up an awareness of a deep imprint I hadn't recognized, but Joshua saw immediately. It was so helpful in moving forward in my healing process. He also created a specific meditation just for me to connect to my inner guidance.

originalText.text: Josh has been an amazing healer for me. I started seeing Josh around seven years ago.  I had terrible reflux and was on a lot of medication.  After three months  and only a few visits i was off all medication and my acid reflux was completely controlled!  Then i had a bad fall and injured by shoulder and  ankle badly. After a few more sessions with this gentle and very knowledgeable man, my pain was gone and i was able to move normally again.  Most recently he has helped me become aware of how much my neck tension has profoundly affected my whole being.  I now have a deeper awareness of how I can choose to heal myself.  I have since brought my daughters to him and they, too, had a very positive and successful experience.

originalText.text: I have been suffering from headaches for the last 20 years. After a vertigo attack three months ago the severity of the headaches increased. In a neurologist appointment, the doctor asked me how many days a month I did not have  headache and I began to cry as I realized what a chronic state of pain I was in and had accepted as my reality. I have always preferred alternative healing methods as I grew up with an acupuncturist as my mother. In lieu of a lifetime of medication I sought out Joshua.He studied at the Upledger Institute which I knew to be reputable. I came with such desperation and not much hope. Working with Joshua over the past few months has changed the reality I had accepted. Through our work together and his healing I have learned techniques and body work to be aware of the tensions and challenges my body faces and navigate the signals with a kindness and empathy I had never applied to myself. To say I am not getting migraines all the time is incredible. I am grateful to have found Joshua, and thankful he has led me to a place where my pain is decreased and I feel hopeful for a better and healthier life.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Joshua and his practice!  I've recommended him to multiple people in my life who may be stuck and looking for something beyond talking / language-driven changes. It's a mix of talking and table work. Definitely good for feeling more grounded. I expect you'd feel good during / immediately afterward, but also I got great visualization techniques that will be helpful for me for the rest of my life, well beyond the specific sessions. I've done a bit of other craniosacral work and found this take on it more helpful.

originalText.text: thorough and relaxing intro for my initial session here for severe back pain and sciatica.  Initial reduction of pain during the "hands-on" part of the session, and increased awareness of the mind-body nature of my discomfort.
